dialogue.line: Oh… Silly boy! It’s you again!
You shouldn’t have come here… I warned you before that it’s dangerous to wander in the dark.
And yet you walked straight towards the center of the darkness. A foolhardy move, boy.
But bravery has a funny way of betraying people… There’s a big difference between you and I.
The dark makes your world small. It devours your senses and puts you on edge…
But to us? Well… Let’s just say you couldn’t have walked into a worse situation.
